item.title: [RBX][VOIP] Carrier SIP
item.description:
Mar 7, 18:10 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 07/03/2022 08:30 UTC
End Time : 07/03/2022 08:41 UTC
Service impact : Outgoing calls to Carrier SIP RBX were not available
Root Cause : A DNS latency on our cluster impacted outgoing calls routing via Carrier SIP RBX. Carrier SIP SBG was fully available during the incident, SBG region was able to handle customer outgoing calls. We plan to strengthen DNS caching for both Carrier SIP zones to improve our service resilience.
